title: News24.com | A day of firsts as SA makes it through first day in lockdown
description: South Africa has completed its first day in national lockdown and it was a day full of firsts.
content:
South Africa has completed its first day in national lockdown and it was a day full of firsts.
South Africa’s first Covid-19 related death
The coronavirus claimed its first fatality on Friday.
